company_profile.description: Husband-wife building team with nearly a decade of hands-on experience. NZ Certified Builders offering renovations, repairs, decks, and custom projects across the upper North Island from the North Shore to Mangawhai.

executive_summary.key_insight: Friendly Build & Fix has exceptional craftsmanship and client relationships but is losing 12+ hours weekly to manual quoting, scheduling, and admin. Automating these workflows could free up an extra day per week for billable work - worth $45K+ annually at your rates.

not_recommended.title: Enterprise ERP Systems
not_recommended.reason: SAP, Oracle, or large-scale systems are overkill for a 2-person team. Stick with trade-specific tools.

not_recommended.title: Custom-Built Job Management Software
not_recommended.reason: Off-the-shelf NZ trade software like Fergus or Tradify is purpose-built for your needs at a fraction of the cost.

verdict.headline: Strong Fit for Automation
verdict.subheadline: Your business model is ideal for quick wins with minimal disruption
reasoning: Clear time savings available - 12+ hours/week on admin that could be billable
Existing client communication strength means automation enhances rather than replaces your personal touch
NZ-specific trade software is mature and proven for businesses like yours
As NZ Certified Builders, you already have systems thinking in place
verdict.when_to_revisit: Review impact after 3 months - if quoting time drops 50%+, consider phase 2
recommended_approach: Start with quoting software (Buildxact or Fergus) - biggest time saver
Add automated client updates via job management portal in month 2
Implement lead automation once new enquiry volume increases

findings.title: Quoting Takes 3-4 Hours Per Job
findings.description: Each quote requires manual measurements, supplier price lookups, margin calculations, and document formatting. With 8-12 quotes per month, this represents 30-40+ hours of unbillable time. Industry-leading builders use AI-assisted estimation to cut this by 60%.

findings.title: Client Updates Are Manual and Time-Consuming
findings.description: Dani spends 5+ hours weekly on phone calls, texts, and emails keeping clients informed about project progress, schedule changes, and next steps. While this personal touch is valued, much of it could be automated while maintaining your friendly brand.

findings.title: Job Scheduling Is Reactive, Not Proactive
findings.description: Without a centralised scheduling system, jobs occasionally overlap, travel between sites isn't optimised, and weather delays cause cascading rescheduling. Smart scheduling could recover 2-3 hours weekly and reduce client friction from last-minute changes.

findings.title: Lead Follow-Up Falls Through Cracks
findings.description: Website enquiries and referrals sometimes wait 2-3 days for response during busy periods. Research shows 78% of customers choose the first builder to respond. Automated lead capture and instant follow-up could increase conversion by 15-25%.

value_created.description: Increased lead conversion from faster response

findings.title: Invoice and Payment Tracking Is Manual
findings.description: Creating invoices, tracking payments, and following up on overdue accounts is done via spreadsheet. Average payment collection is 45 days when industry best practice is under 30. Automated invoicing with payment reminders could improve cash flow by 30%.

value_created.description: Improved cash flow and reduced payment collection time

sources: Trade payment benchmarks - Xero Small Business Insights NZ

recommendations.title: Implement AI-Assisted Quoting Software
recommendations.description: Deploy a trade-specific quoting tool that integrates with NZ supplier pricing, auto-calculates materials from measurements, and generates professional quotes in minutes instead of hours.

why_it_matters.customer_value: Clients receive accurate, professional quotes same-day instead of waiting 3-5 days. Faster response wins more jobs.
why_it_matters.business_health: Reclaim 6+ hours weekly for billable work. More accurate estimates mean better margins and fewer surprises.

risk.description: Learning curve - 2-3 weeks to get comfortable
risk.mitigation: Use Buildxact's NZ support team for onboarding

risk.description: Initial quotes may need manual adjustment
risk.mitigation: Review all quotes for first month, build templates

custom_solution.approach: Build custom quoting spreadsheet with macros and supplier API connections

recommendations.recommendation_rationale: Buildxact's NZ supplier integration and AI-assisted takeoffs will save the most time on your complex renovation quotes. The $70/month extra over Tradify pays back in the first week from time savings. Their NZ support team understands local building requirements.

recommendations.title: Set Up Automated Client Communication Portal
recommendations.description: Use job management software to give clients a portal where they can see project progress, photos, schedules, and next steps - reducing inbound calls while maintaining your personal touch for important conversations.

why_it_matters.customer_value: Clients feel informed 24/7 without having to call. They can share progress with family/friends, increasing referrals.
why_it_matters.business_health: Dani reclaims 4+ hours weekly from routine update calls. Focus shifts to high-value client relationships.

risk.description: Clients may prefer personal calls initially
risk.mitigation: Position portal as 'in addition to' not 'instead of' your service

risk.description: Need to remember to update job status
risk.mitigation: Set daily reminder, takes 5 mins to update all jobs

off_the_shelf.name: Fergus
pros: Built in NZ for NZ trades
Great mobile app for site updates

custom_solution.approach: Build client portal using Notion or Airtable with automation

recommendations.recommendation_rationale: Fergus is built in Wellington specifically for NZ trades. The client portal is excellent, mobile app works well on-site, and it integrates with Xero for invoicing. At $79/month, ROI is achieved in the first month.
assumptions: Currently 5+ hours/week on client update calls
70% of routine calls eliminated via portal

recommendations.title: Implement Lead Capture and Auto-Response
recommendations.description: Set up automated lead capture from your website with instant personalised response and CRM tracking. Ensure no enquiry waits more than 5 minutes for acknowledgment, even when you're on-site.

why_it_matters.customer_value: Potential clients get immediate acknowledgment and clear next steps, building trust before you've even spoken.
why_it_matters.business_health: Capture leads that currently fall through cracks. First-responder advantage in competitive market.

risk.mitigation: Write responses in Dani's friendly voice, promise personal callback within 24hrs

custom_solution.approach: Zapier connecting website form to SMS/email automation
cons: Can break if any component changes

recommendations.recommendation_rationale: Start with HubSpot Free - it's genuinely free and handles lead capture, auto-response, and basic CRM. If Fergus becomes your main system (from recommendation #2), use its built-in lead features instead.
assumptions: 15% improvement in conversion from faster response

short_term.title: Deploy Buildxact for Quoting
short_term.description: Set up AI-assisted quoting with NZ supplier integration

short_term.title: Set Up Fergus Client Portal
short_term.description: Enable client portal and train on mobile updates
short_term.expected_outcome: Clients can see job progress 24/7, reducing update calls by 60%

mid_term.title: Lead Capture Automation
mid_term.expected_outcome: Every lead gets response within 5 minutes, 24/7

mid_term.title: Xero Integration
mid_term.description: Connect job management to accounting for automated invoicing
mid_term.expected_outcome: Invoices generated automatically on job completion

long_term.title: Smart Scheduling
long_term.description: Optimise job scheduling with travel time and weather integration
long_term.expected_outcome: Better job sequencing, less windshield time

long_term.title: Review & Referral Automation
long_term.description: Automated review requests and referral program

tasks.title: Create Buildxact account and complete NZ business setup
Connect PlaceMakers and ITM supplier price lists
Import past 5 quotes as templates for similar job types
Set up margin rules and labour rates
Complete Buildxact 30-min getting started video course
Create first live quote using the system (compare to manual)
Refine templates based on first quote experience
Send first quote to client via Buildxact
Create Fergus account and complete business profile
Import current jobs and client list from spreadsheet
Install Fergus mobile app and test on-site photo upload
Configure client portal branding with logo and colours
Create welcome email template for portal invitations
Invite 3 current clients to test portal experience
Update first job with photos and progress via mobile app
Gather feedback from test clients and adjust

adoption_stats.metric: NZ builders using job management software
Time saved on admin with trade software

social_proof.result: Reduced quoting time by 65%, won 3 extra jobs per month
Eliminated 'where's my update?' calls entirely with client portal
Automated lead follow-up increased enquiry conversion by 40%

stack_assessment.verdict_text: Good Foundation - Your existing tools integrate well

next_steps.headline: Ready to Transform Your Operations
next_steps.message: With $71K+ annual value potential and only 23 hours of DIY setup, Friendly Build & Fix is well-positioned to automate key workflows. Start with quoting automation for the biggest immediate impact.

confidence_factors: Strong existing client relationships to build on
limitations: Revenue projections based on industry averages - actual results vary
Implementation assumes consistent usage of new tools
ROI assumes current hourly rates maintained
